author: craigmcc
msg: Add a getter to retrieve the public ID of the DTD under which we are
parsing the current document (if any).  This allows processing logic that
can accept different versions (such as the servlet 2.2 and 2.3 web.xml
DTDs) to behave differently based on which kind of input is being

author: craigmcc
msg: Implement a hook for lazy configuration of Digester instances, similar to
what James Stachan proposed in his DigesterSupport class (which is also
similar to what was included in the RSSDigester demo).

author: craigmcc
msg: Do *not* call getRules().clear() in the clear() method.  This was causing
subsequent uses of the same configured Digester instance to fail without
Add a unit test that ensures that you can parse the same input twice with
the same configured Digester, get equivalent results, but get different
object trees (which was the failure mode fixed by this patch).
Based on a patch submitted by Gidado-Yisa Immanuel <avm3@cdc.gov>

author: craigmcc
msg: Update version number for future development.
